doubleLine.p: Here is a paragraph with enough text to show line wrapping. With double line spacing it should start on line 1 and when wrapping should leave a blank line between lines of Braille.⠠⠐⠓⠀⠊⠎⠀⠁⠀⠏⠜⠁⠛⠗⠁⠏⠓⠀⠾⠀⠢⠀⠞⠑⠭⠞⠀⠞⠕⠀⠩⠪⠀⠇⠔⠑⠀⠺⠗⠁⠏⠏⠬⠲⠀⠠⠾⠀⠙⠳⠃⠇⠑⠀⠇⠔⠑⠀⠎⠏⠁⠉⠬⠀⠭⠀⠩⠙⠀⠌⠜⠞⠀⠕⠝⠀⠇⠔⠑⠀⠼⠁⠀⠯⠀⠱⠢⠀⠺⠗⠁⠏⠏⠬⠀⠩⠙⠀⠇⠂⠧⠑⠀⠁⠀⠃⠇⠁⠝⠅⠀⠇⠔⠑⠀⠆⠞⠀⠇⠔⠑⠎⠀⠷⠀⠠⠃⠗⠇⠲
When there are multiple paragraphs there should be a blank line between the paragraphs.⠠⠱⠢⠀⠐⠮⠀⠜⠑⠀⠍⠥⠇⠞⠊⠏⠇⠑⠀⠏⠜⠁⠛⠗⠁⠏⠓⠎⠀⠐⠮⠀⠩⠙⠀⠆⠀⠁⠀⠃⠇⠁⠝⠅⠀⠇⠔⠑⠀⠆⠞⠀⠮⠀⠏⠜⠁⠛⠗⠁⠏⠓⠎⠲
